title: VA - The Raga Guide. A Survey of 74 Hindustani Ragas (Book, 4CDs
description:
https://itunes.apple.com/in/album/raga-guide-survey-74-hindustani/id220037848

FLAC

Hariprasad Chaurasia - flute
Buddhadev DasGupta - sarod
Shruti Sadolikar-Katkar - vocal
Vidyadhar Vyas - vocal

Tabla:

Sandip Bhattacharya for Vidhyadar Vyas
Devendra Kanti Chakrabarty for Buddhadev DasGupta
Shib Shankar for Hariprasad Chaurasia (Ted de Jong - on Ragas Asavari, Jogiya and Kafi)
Madhukar Kothare for Shruti Sadolikar-Katkar

Sarangi:

Anant Krishnaji Kunte for Shruti Sadolikar-Katkar
